name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Finally passed the review of X. Now, you can support this account by subscribing.
Thank you for your continued support and help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Near Wenguang Tower in Chaoyang District, Shantou City, Guangdong Province
Villagers of Dutou Village oppose the village's minimum living allowance director Ma Yehao's joining the party

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 9 am on April 5, a fire broke out at a motorcycle company warehouse at the intersection of Zhuyi Road, Changsha-Zhutan Market, Yuetang District, Xiangtan City, Hunan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 5, Shandong. A netizen posted a video saying that his father had worked at Heze Juye Hongda Food Co., Ltd. for 38 years. After he became ill, he found out that the company had never paid for his medical insurance, resulting in his daily treatment costs reaching thousands of yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 5, Sichuan. A man posted a video to report that a volunteer teacher named Xiao used students’ meal fees to make false accounts and fed students rotten vegetables.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Yongchun County, Quanzhou, Fujian Province, issued a "Notice on the Clearance and Removal of Non-Staff Personnel in County and Township Government Agencies and Institutions".
It mentioned that existing non-staff personnel should be reduced but not increased; non-staff personnel used by service windows should be removed. Non-staff personnel who exceed 10% of the total number of staff in their units should be removed in principle; units that employ more than 10 non-staff personnel should reduce the number appropriately.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Outside the Yanda Hospital in Yanjiao, Hebei, a taxi driver stabbed a Didi driver in the neck several times with a screwdriver.
According to online reports, it was suspected that he was trying to steal a passenger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 2, the village committee of Tangwanli Village, Anping Town, Lianyuan City, Hunan Province, rented out more than 400 mu of the village's collective forest to a coal mine for open-pit coal mining, which destroyed the village's farmland and forests. The ash produced during coal mining also made the villagers miserable. On that day, the villagers gathered at the construction site to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 6, Zhengzhou, Henan. Yangtze River No. 1 residential complex failed to deliver the houses on time, and the owners blocked the road to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some property owners even jumped off the roof to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 6, a former Pinduoduo employee said on Maimai that he was photographed interviewing at another company after leaving Pinduoduo. He was sentenced in absentia by the Changning District Court for violating the non-compete agreement and was ordered to compensate Pinduoduo 1.5 million yuan, but his appeal was fruitless.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The contributor who went to No. 80 Hongxing Road to take photos on the evening of the 4th was called in for questioning later that day. Others confirmed that the contributor went home that night and his account was no longer in use. However, at 8:30 am local time today, the police sent me a phishing URL using his account. Professionals have verified that this URL may be intended to obtain my IP address. I would like to remind all bloggers and netizens not to click on any unknown links in your private messages easily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
This is the first time that a contributor's account has been stolen by the police.
Before that, some phishing links appeared in my mailbox.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 1, a family member of a martyred pilot in Guangdong posted a message saying that her son was bullied in school, insulted by classmates, given insulting nicknames, and beaten. She felt that all this was because her child had lost his father, and now she didn't know how to solve it. However, as of now, the family member's Douyin account has been set to a private account. The topic "Family member of a martyred pilot said his son was bullied in school" was also banned.
